AddContent.title: Take Your Pick
AddContent.meetingDescription: Quickly start a meeting and make it work as you go!
AddContent.streamDescription: Stream your content through Pavilion for other users to watch.
AddContent.shareVideoDescription: Upload a video from your device to Pavilion.
AddContent.customMeetingDescription: Roll up your sleeves and plan a meeting, from when it starts and who's invited to what functions are available.
AddContent.streamingStudioDescription: Create a meeting and stream it through multiple channels at once both in and out of Pavilion.
AddContent.webinarDescription: Create a large meeting that follows the format of a seminar with speakers and attendees.

AboutUs.title: About
AboutUs.text1: Pavilion is an open-source social-media platform and a content creation tool rolled into one. You can create meetings, upload videos, share and record your video content, all through Pavilion. It is created by the team behind Doganbros and their over 20 years of experience in the field of multi-media delivery.
AboutUs.text2: About 8 years ago, two brothers joined together to create Doganbros, with a vision to create a software workshop, combining the personal feel of freelance developers and the professionalism of large outsourcing companies.
AboutUs.text3: While they worked on the projects they took under, the idea for a platform combining their talents started to form. A toolbox for content creators, where they start, record and publish their live feeds or upload videos. A flexible hub they can either make use of directly, or connect with an API. With tools to aid publishing and monetizing their creation. This idea became Pavilion

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.text1: Doganbros operates the app.pavilion.network website, which provides the SERVICE. This page is used to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Pavilion website.
PrivacyPolicy.text2: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.text3: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at app.pavilion.network, unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.description1: For a better experience while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, email address and job title. The information that we collect will be used to contact or identify you.
PrivacyPolicy.description2: We want to inform you that whenever you visit our Service, we collect information that your browser sends to us that is called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your computer’s Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser version, pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and other statistics.
PrivacyPolicy.description31: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that is commonly used as an anonymous unique identifier. These are sent to your browser from the website that you visit and are stored on your computer’s hard drive.
PrivacyPolicy.description32: Our website uses these "cookies" to collect information and to improve our Service. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies, and know when a cookie is being sent to your computer. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
PrivacyPolicy.description41: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
PrivacyPolicy.description41ListItem2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
PrivacyPolicy.description41ListItem4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
PrivacyPolicy.description42: We want to inform our Service users that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
PrivacyPolicy.description5: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
PrivacyPolicy.description6: Our Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
PrivacyPolicy.description7: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, we advise you to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately, after they are posted on this page.
PrivacyPolicy.description8: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to <0>contact us</0>.

TermsAndConditions.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Pavilion, a decentralized, creator-centric social media platform. By accessing or using Pavilion, you agree to abide by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
TermsAndConditions.acceptanceDescription: By using Pavilion, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, along with any policies referenced herein. If you do not agree, you should discontinue use of Pavilion immediately.
TermsAndConditions.decentralizedDescription: Pavilion operates on a decentralized infrastructure, meaning:
TermsAndConditions.noCentralAuthority: There is no central authority controlling data, content, or user interactions.
TermsAndConditions.contentStored: Content is stored on distributed servers and blockchain networks.
TermsAndConditions.noAbilityToModify: Pavilion does not have the ability to modify, delete, or recover user-generated content once published.
TermsAndConditions.userResponsibilitiesDescription: As a user of Pavilion, you agree to:
TermsAndConditions.responsibleForContent: Be responsible for your own content and interactions on the platform.
TermsAndConditions.complianceWithLaws: Ensure that your content complies with applicable laws and regulations.
TermsAndConditions.respectPrivacy: Respect the rights and privacy of other users.
TermsAndConditions.safeguardKeys: Safeguard your private keys and account credentials.
TermsAndConditions.lossOfKeys: You acknowledge that loss of private keys may result in permanent loss of access to your account and content, and Pavilion has no means to recover lost credentials.
TermsAndConditions.prohibitedDescription: You agree not to engage in:
TermsAndConditions.illegalContent: Illegal Content: Uploading or sharing content that violates laws or regulations.
TermsAndConditions.hateSpeech: Hate Speech & Harassment: Using the platform for threats, harassment, or discrimination.
TermsAndConditions.maliciousActivities: Malicious Activities: Uploading harmful software, engaging in hacking, or attempting to exploit vulnerabilities in the platform.
TermsAndConditions.spamManipulation: Spam & Manipulation: Engaging in misleading behavior, such as artificially inflating engagement.
TermsAndConditions.violationOfIP: Violation of Intellectual Property: Sharing content that you do not have the rights to distribute.
TermsAndConditions.violationsResult: Violations of these terms may result in action taken by the decentralized governance community, such as reporting or blacklisting.
TermsAndConditions.ownershipDescription: You retain full ownership of the content you create and publish on Pavilion.
TermsAndConditions.licenseGrant: By posting content, you grant Pavilion users a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to access, view, and interact with your content within the decentralized network.
TermsAndConditions.contentRemoval: Due to the decentralized nature of Pavilion, content removal is not guaranteed, as it may be stored across multiple independent nodes.
TermsAndConditions.noWarrantiesDescription: Pavilion is provided 'as is,' without warranties of any kind, including but not limited to:
TermsAndConditions.protectionFromLoss: Protection from data loss or unauthorized access.
TermsAndConditions.recoveryOfContent: Recovery of lost content or credentials.
TermsAndConditions.limitationOfLiability: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Pavilion and its contributors shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform.
TermsAndConditions.governanceDescription: Pavilion is governed through a decentralized governance model.
TermsAndConditions.updatesToTerms: Updates to these Terms and Conditions may be proposed and voted on by the community.
TermsAndConditions.reviewUpdates: It is your responsibility to review updates and ensure continued compliance.
TermsAndConditions.enforcementDescription: Pavilion does not have the ability to enforce bans or deletions centrally; enforcement relies on community moderation tools.
TermsAndConditions.violationsSubject: Users violating these Terms may be subject to reporting, blacklisting, or filtering mechanisms implemented by the community.
TermsAndConditions.thirdPartyDescription: Pavilion may integrate with external services such as wallets or content storage providers.
TermsAndConditions.thirdPartyResponsibility: Pavilion is not responsible for the policies, security, or reliability of third-party integrations.
TermsAndConditions.supportDescription: Since Pavilion is decentralized, there is no central authority managing support requests. For assistance, you may engage with the community through governance forums or official Pavilion communication channels.
TermsAndConditions.continuedUse: Your continued use of the platform signifies acceptance of any future updates or amendments.
